name: KillBooks
description:
KillBooks is a 2.5D Side Scrolling endless runner made for the Friday Night Game Jam which shows how exesive homework can ruin the fun for a teen, even in holidays. 

You play as a teenage student who is burdened by exesive holiday homework and has no choice but to spend the entire summer doing the homework 

Controls : 

Aim : Mouse

Shoot : Left Mouse click

How does this fit theme you may ask?

 - burdened with the holiday homework, you don't get to enjoy the summer and before you even know it, winter has started and the SUMMER HAS ENDED

Credits : 

Skybox   :   https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/allsky-free-10-s... 

Environment pieces like fences and grass :

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-10...

What did I make from scratch ?

- Trees, character, gun, books and the game logic
